meta.name: description
meta.content: Mission Consolidated Independent School District serves K-12th grade students and is located in Mission, TX.

article.aria-label: A former MHS graduate rolls out a floral creation that goes viral

img.alt: 2008 MHS graduate, David Juarez, creator of the toilet paper bouquet.

h3.a: A former MHS graduate rolls out a floral creation that goes viral

div.div: Creating toilet paper floral bouquets is all in a day's work for David Juarez. His creative idea went viral and increased nationwide interest.

article.aria-label: VMHS engineering students put their skills to work supporting essential front line workers

h3.a: VMHS engineering students put their skills to work supporting essential front line workers

div.div: Three students involved in the engineering programs at Veterans Memorial High School have turned some of their energy during the COVID-19 pandemic into a community support project.
Damian Gonzalez has received notification that he has been selected for the prestigious award.

article.aria-label: Two Mission CISD high schools ranked as best in America

h3.a: Two Mission CISD high schools ranked as best in America

div.div: The annual rankings are out, and for the second year in a row, Mission CISD has two high schools on the list of Best High Schools in America.
Governor orders schools closed for remainder of the school year, with instruction to continue.

article.aria-label: Mission CISD families first in state to receive Meals-To-You shipments

h3.a: Mission CISD families first in state to receive Meals-To-You shipments

div.div: Mission CISD was not only the first school district in the state to gain approval by the national program through the U.S. Department of Agriculture and Baylor University, but Mission CISD families are also the first in the state to start receiving their meals for students.

article.aria-label: Teacher Work Day (No School for Students)

h3.a: Teacher Work Day (No School for Students)

section.div: Our Vision: Mission CISD will prepare and inspire all students to be equipped to excel in the college and career of their choice, dominate 21st century skills in leadership, knowledge, language, and technology to compete in a global economy and serve as successful citizens in their community.

li.span: Over 2,300 professional certifications earned by students (18-19 school year)
13,139 college hours earned by students during the 2018-2019 school year.

div.div: * MISSION CISD ADOPTED A TAX RATE THAT WILL RAISE MORE TAXES FOR MAINTENANCE AND OPERATIONS THAN LAST YEAR'S TAX RATE
